info.title: Showcase what makes you unique.
info.description: At Local Secrets, we help you emphasise what sets your business apart: its Story, its Essence, its Connection to the local. Showcase your space or event on our platform and allow travellers from around the world, and even locals, to discover what isn't in the search engines but stays in their hearts.

steps.mainTitle: YOUR GLOBAL SHOWCASE WITH NO COMMISSIONS

step1.title: CREATE
step1.subtitle: Make your proposal with your own identity
step1.description: Propose your space, activity, or event on our platform. Describe what makes you unique and add real images. We will review and validate it to see if it’s a Local Secret.

step2.title: CONNECT
step2.subtitle: Connect with people who value the local
step2.description: You will become part of a curated network of real recommendations. Here, there are no algorithms: visibility is driven by quality and affinity with those seeking to experience your city like a local.

step3.title: GROW
step3.subtitle: Make your business thrive without middlemen
step3.description: Gain visits, recommendations, and direct connections without commissions or booking fees. No commissions, no intermediaries, no external rules.

testimonials.title: What those in the Community say
testimonials.description: Small businesses, local entrepreneurs, and passionate professionals are already part of Local Secrets. They’ve decided to showcase their essence, connect with an audience seeking authentic experiences, and give visibility to what makes them unique. From traditional markets to cultural spaces, they all share one thing in common: they no longer go unnoticed. Discover how Local Secrets has helped transform their local presence into a global opportunity.

items.text: "Local Secrets reached out to me to propose including my workshop. At first, I was hesitant, but when I learned about their model—no commissions, just an annual fee—I knew it was exactly what I was looking for: simple, transparent, and affordable. Much better than other platforms that take a share of your work. Today, I’m happy to be part of a network that truly values the local."

"I used Local Secrets as a traveller in Barcelona and was surprised by the quality of the sites they recommended. It wasn’t the typical places: they were spots with soul. When I returned home, I thought, why isn’t my space there? I reached out to the team and, before long, I was part of the network. I’m proud that my business is now also a Local Secret."

"I’ve worked with many booking platforms, and almost all operate the same way: they take a commission for every customer you get. When Local Secrets contacted me, my first thought was, more of the same. But no. They explained their annual subscription model with no commissions, and it seemed like an honest and very reasonable proposal."

cta.title: Publish your local secret or log in as an LS manager
cta.description: Do you think your business should be on Local Secrets? Leave us your email, and we’ll tell you how to make it happen.
